title: Untitled
national_geographical_coverage: Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina, cantons.
computation_definitions: Marriage is the act, ceremony or process by which the legal relationship of husband and wife is constituted. The legality of the union may be established by civil, religious or other means as recognized by the laws of each country.
comments_limitations: Data for the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina are the sum of data for cantons.
